about_the_game:
※ This content is available for individual purchase only. To play, you need to purchase the main game "METAL DOGS".

About the Content

■ 3 New Quests Added!

■ 6 New Types of Monsters Added!
In the new quests, six types of monsters that have not appeared in the main story will appear.

■ New Equipment Items Added!
By defeating the new monsters, equipment related to those monsters will become available.

About the Quests

In the quests added this time, the drop rate of "Dog tag" used for item exchange at the exchange center will be increased.
※ The relevant quests will be unlocked after clearing "Loyal dog, fire missiles too!"

short_description: This is a DLC where you can play quests featuring additional monsters from the shooting action game "METAL DOGS". 3 New Quests, 6 New Types of Monsters, New Equipment Items Added!
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
